page.title: 03 Eastham - Village
page.content: Two things that the{villagers } could not do with out are the shops and the bank. The shops have probably been there since 1926, before that they were probably only cottages. The bank has always been a bank. There is a{Village Association} which meets in the old St.Anselems sports hall. It discusses things like the running of the buses, the redevelopment of the village and the dangers of storing chemicals in tanks near such a highly populated area. At the end of each meeting there is always a chance for the villagers to ask questions and air their views.
